value.title: Detect upload of sensitive information to Power BI using Microsoft 365 data loss prevention policies

value.title: Announcing general availability of Export Power BI report to file API
value.excerpt: I am thrilled to announce the general availability (GA) of Export Power BI report to file API. This API allows you to export Power BI reports to the following file formats: PDF, PPTX (PowerPoint) and PNG, by using a REST call.
